page.title: 13Organisations
page.content:
Below is a list of the many organisations which take an active part in the life of the village.
1 Community Council. 2 Women's Institute. 3 Merched Y Wawr. 4 W.E.A. 5 Evening Classes.(Education Authority) 6 Amenities Committee. 7 Church. 8 Chapel. 9 Carnival Committee. 10 School.
1 Community Council (now a joint council with Waen and Cwm) hold monthly meetings and pass on opinions of local people to other councils ie:- Rhuddlan Borough Council,Clwyd County Council,Welsh Water Authority etc.
